mapper.select: select * from (select * from USER_MEMBER where id=#{id}) m left join USER_RECORD r on m.id=r.id
select * from (select g.*, ROWNUM rnum from (select * from user_grade where #{BUY_TOTAL} >= standard order by standard desc) g) where rnum = 1

select * from (select o.*, s.STATE st from (select * from ORDERTBL where user_id = #{id}) o left join STATE s on o.state = s.STATE_NUM) s left join CUPON_TYPE t on s.cupon_type = t.CUPON_NUM where rownum < 10 order by s.order_date desc
select num, title, reply from (select c.*, rownum rnum from (select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by counsel_date desc) c)rst where rnum < 10
select * from USER_LOGIN_LOG where id={id} where rownum < 10 order by CHECKIN_DATE desc
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_MEMBER set memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) count from ordertbl where user_id = #{id}
